item.title: Advancing your R
item.description: The British Ecological Society Quantitative Ecology Group are hosting a two-day R workshop which will cover reproducible data manipulation and visualisation workflows in R. Day One will be focussed on the tidyverse, while Day Two will move into working with spatial data. Day One: Data manipulation and visualisation in R using the tidyverse Workshop leader: Gergana Daskalova, University of Edinburgh, Coding Club The tidyverse collection of packages (tidyr, dplyr, ggplot2, broom and more) is a great tool for efficient data manipulation, visualisation and analysis.
